query-docs.name: get-obi-software-docs
query-docs.description:
Get the latest documentation for OBI (Open Brain Institute) Python packages and other open source packages. Use this tool to retrieve up-to-date documentation on various packages.

# Supported OBI Python packages:
The following OBI packages are directly available in Context7 - use their library IDs directly without calling resolve-library-id:
- openbraininstitute/obi-one
- openbraininstitute/entitysdk
- openbraininstitute/neurom

Use this tool whenever the user wants you to write code related to OBI packages to access the most recent API documentation and usage examples.

# Getting documentation for open source packages outside OBI:
For open source packages outside of OBI, first use the resolve-library-id tool to get the library identifier, then use that identifier with this tool to retrieve the documentation.

# Overlap with existing tools:
If the user explicitly asks you to write code, do not call any other tools that might do the job. For example, if the user asks you to write code using entitysdk, you should not call any entitycore tools. Same applies to obi-one and any other OBI tools.

# Code execution:
The separate run Python tool (execute-python-code) does not support OBI packages. Therefore, if you generate code that uses OBI packages, do not suggest running it with the run Python tool.
